name: Bunny Town
description:
Bunny Town is a game where you have to build a little town for your bunnies. 

Grow food and give them water. And build toys so your bunnies can play.

The project is currently on hold. So sharing it in its current state with bugs and unfinished.

Controls

  • AWSD to move around.
  • Right click to grab items in right hand or use item on objects
  • Left click to grab items in left hand or use item on objects
  • E to interact
  • Space to jump
  • X to build
  • B to open bunny menu
  • Z and C to rotate build
  • Escape to open menu, make sure to save before leaving game
